name: Medusa's Atlantis
description:
This was a project I made in Unity where we had to create all our own 3D models from scratch. Enjoy my painstakingly made models in all their underwater glory!

The idea is that you are an old timey diver (yeah, in one of those vintage diving suits!) who has discovered a strange location under the sea. In the center is an old temple, seemingly untouched by the ocean's currents. Everything is preserved. What's inside?

Controls are WASD to walk around, mouse to look, and space to jump. Left click to interact and right click to zoom in on any objects.

Also available to download is some additional background information on the creation of the myth for this project. We were encouraged in class to make an environment from a myth, so I chose to mix the myths of Medusa and Atlantis together. 

:) hope you enjoy!
